doc.title: Asylum
doc.plot: After committing a deadly mistake with ultra-violent gangsters a small-time crook ends up tied to a tree deep in the woods. Bait for all kinds of predators, wandering creatures, and condemned to thirst and hunger. Pure torture. Food for thought for a young wannabe gangster who fought hard to join the baddest gang of all. Beware what you wish for. You might not survive it.
